title: New: LUEM – wait
body:
Love this debut track from Seattle’s LUEM.

Part Lana Del Rey, part Lorde, part Purity Ring, merged with some even ‘poppier’ roots, it’s a mightily exciting first step. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Love this debut track from Seattle’s LUEM. Part Lana Del Rey, part Lorde, part Purity Ring, merged with some even ‘poppier’ roots, it’s a mightily exciting first step. Check it out below.
